briefTitle: Anemia Studies in Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD): Erythropoiesis Via a Novel Prolyl Hydroxylase Inhibitor (PHI) Daprodustat-in Incident Dialysis (ASCEND-ID)
officialTitle: A 52-week Open-label (Sponsor-blind), Randomized, Active-controlled, Parallel-group, Multi-center Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Daprodustat Compared to Recombinant Human Erythropoietin in Subjects With Anemia Associated With Chronic Kidney Disease Who Are Initiating Dialysis
summary: The purpose of this multi-center study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of daprodustat in subjects with anemia associated with CKD.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Change From Baseline in Hemoglobin (Hgb) During Evaluation Period (Week 28 to Week 52)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline (Pre-dose on Day 1) and evaluation period (Week 28 to Week 52)
